column1: The  Company  has  entered  into  certain  off–balance  sheet  commitments  that  require  the  future  purchase  of  goods  or  services  (“unconditional  purchase
obligations”).  The  Company’s  unconditional  purchase  obligations  primarily  consist  of  supplier  arrangements,  licensed  intellectual  property  and  content,  and
distribution  rights.  Future  payments  under  unconditional  purchase  obligations  with  a  remaining  term  in  excess  of  one  year  as  of  September  28,  2024,  are  as
